page.title: 12Much Marcle Shop
page.content: There has been a village shop in Much Marcle for 60 years. The shop is very busy and it opens from 7.45 am to 6 pm. It opens every day even on Sunday morning. The shop sells general groceries,Coal and calor gas,lots of people use the village shop.Its main customers are the people in the village but in the summer motorists stop to buy ice creams and soft drinks. Summer and Christmas are the busiest times. Inside the village shop there is a post office which offers all the same services as a main branch. The only thing that you cannot buy is car tax. Not long ago the inside of the shop was changed to make it more like a supermarket.Everyone says the change is a good one. I think that there will always be a village shop in Much Marcle.
